name: Journey To The Cursed City
description:
Do you like WORLD BUILDING? Do you like reading LORE? If you do, you might enjoy this game. It is a short, story game set in a fantasy world.

Collect books to become fluent in different languages. Then listen to what various characters have to say about themselves and their world.

This game is made using Bitsy, which means there is no sound or music. I recommend putting on some fantasy music in the background while you play.

Minimally interactive, a few very lite puzzles. Runs in browser and on most mobile devices.

~4,600 words total. Takes about 20-50 minutes to play depending on how much you read.
